contentrichtext.text: '''Steve''' or '''Steven Jones''' may refer to: {{tocright}} == Music == * [[Steve Jones (musician)]] (born 1955), English rock and roll guitarist and singer, member of the Sex Pistols * Steve Jones, musician ([[The Unforgiven (band)|The Unforgiven]]) and television producer == Sports == * [[Steve Jones (American football)]] (born 1951), American football player * [[Steve Jones (athlete)]] (born 1955), Welsh athlete * [[Steve Jones (baseball)]] (born 1941), American baseball pitcher * [[Steve Jones (basketball)]] (born 1942), American basketballer * [[Steve Jones (cricketer)]] (born 1949), Australian cricketer * [[Steve Jones (footballer born 1957)]], English footballer * [[Steve Jones (footballer born 1960)]], English footballer * [[Steve Jones (footballer born March 1970)]], English footballer * [[Steve Jones (footballer born December 1970)]], English footballer * [[Steve Jones (Northern Irish footballer)]] (born 1976), Northern Irish footballer * [[Steve Jones (golfer)]] (born 1958), American golfer * [[Steve Jones (rugby player born 1951)]] (1951â€“2007), Welsh rugby union player * [[Steve Jones (rugby player born 1977)]], Welsh rugby union player * [[Steve Jones (rugby player born 1983)]], English rugby union player == Scientists == * [[Steve Jones (biologist)]] (born 1944), professor of genetics at University College London * [[Steven E. Jones]] (born 1949), American physicist and researcher * [[Steve G. Jones]], clinical hypnotherapist == Other == * [[Steve Jones (aviator)]] (born 1960), British pilot * [[Steve Jones (presenter)]] (born 1977), Welsh TV presenter * [[Steve Jones (game show presenter)]] (born 1945), English former musician turned game show presenter and voice-over artist * [[Steve C. Jones]] (born 1957), Georgia Superior Court judge ==See also== * [[Stephen Jones (disambiguation)]] * [[Staff Jones]] (born 1959), Wales international rugby union player of the 1980s {{hndis|Jones, Steve}}
